FOREST.description: there's trees around you and a clearing in front of you

interactionResults.PHONE: You phone help and get saved

interactionResults.PHONE: You phone help and get saved

BACKYARD.description: you are behind the house, there is a shed

interactionResults.PHONE: You phone help and get saved

SHED.description: you are surrounded by garden tools, there's a key hanging on a nail on the wall

itemDescriptions.STRANGE_KEY: It's an old, slightly rusty skeleton key

HOUSE.description: uninhabited but clean, theres a phone

itemDescriptions.PHONE: It's an old grey nokia flip phone

DIRT_PATCH.description: Looks like something was buried here

interactionResults.SHOVEL: you dig a hole and theres a chest
interactionResults.PHONE: You phone help and get saved

BACK_FOREST.description: you are in the forest on the other side of the clearing, theres a shovel on the ground

interactionResults.PHONE: You phone help and get saved
interactionResults.SHOVEL: It's an iron shovel with a wooden handle

THE_HOLE.description: you dug this hole, theres a chest in it

interactionResults.STRANGE_KEY: you open the chest and get another key
